languages.text: {n}Голос Паскаля, взирающего на тело павшей техносестры, звучит сурово и... скорбно.{/n} "Нихель нарушила процедуру, и потому была выведена из функционирования. Но это не значит, что она ошибалась. То, что я вижу... Разрушительная мощь Эсхатоса, энтропийная энергия, распространяемая этим секретом... Я не могу гарантировать подконтрольность Эсхатоса. Я не могу гарантировать, что его существование угодно Омниссии".

{n}As Pasqal gazes upon the body of his fallen tech-sister, his voice sounds stern and... mournful:{/n} "Nihel violated the procedure, and thus her functions had to be terminated. But that does not mean she was wrong. What I see... The destructive power of Eschatos, the entropic energy this secret emanates... I cannot guarantee that Eschatos remains controllable. I cannot guarantee that its existence pleases the Omnissiah."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Паскаля, взирающего на тело павшей техносестры, звучит сурово и... скорбно.{/n} "Нихель нарушила процедуру, и потому была выведена из функционирования. Но это не значит, что она ошибалась. То, что я вижу... Разрушительная мощь Эсхатоса, энтропийная энергия, распространяемая этим секретом... Я не могу гарантировать подконтрольность Эсхатоса. Я не могу гарантировать, что его существование угодно Омниссии".

languages.text: {n}地に伏した技術同胞の身体をじっと見つめるパスカルの声には、厳しくも…死者を悼む響きがある。{/n}「ニヘルは手順を逸脱したため、その機能を停止せざるを得なかった。しかし、彼女が間違っていたわけではない。思うに…破壊をもたらすエスカトの力、この秘密から生じたエントロピー…エスカトを今も制御できるとは保証できない。その存在が万機神のお気に召すとも断言できない」
languages.original_text: {n}As Pasqal gazes upon the body of his fallen tech-sister, his voice sounds stern and... mournful:{/n} "Nihel violated the procedure, and thus her functions had to be terminated. But that does not mean she was wrong. What I see... The destructive power of Eschatos, the entropic energy this secret emanates... I cannot guarantee that Eschatos remains controllable. I cannot guarantee that its existence pleases the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}地に伏した技術同胞の身体をじっと見つめるパスカルの声には、厳しくも…死者を悼む響きがある。{/n}「ニヘルは手順を逸脱したため、その機能を停止せざるを得なかった。しかし、彼女が間違っていたわけではない。思うに…破壊をもたらすエスカトの力、この秘密から生じたエントロピー…エスカトを今も制御できるとは保証できない。その存在が万機神のお気に召すとも断言できない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡凝视着技术姐妹的尸体，声音听起来十分严厉……又充满哀伤。{/n}“妮赫尔违反了程序，因此必须终止她的功能，但这并不意味着她是错的。我已经看到了……终焉审判的破坏力，以及这个秘密所散发出的熵能……我无法保证终焉审判始终都会处在我们的掌控之中，也无法保证它的存在能取悦欧姆尼塞亚。”
languages.original_text: {n}As Pasqal gazes upon the body of his fallen tech-sister, his voice sounds stern and... mournful:{/n} "Nihel violated the procedure, and thus her functions had to be terminated. But that does not mean she was wrong. What I see... The destructive power of Eschatos, the entropic energy this secret emanates... I cannot guarantee that Eschatos remains controllable. I cannot guarantee that its existence pleases the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡凝视着技术姐妹的尸体，声音听起来十分严厉……又充满哀伤。{/n}“雅珀违反了程序，因此必须终止她的功能，但这并不意味着她是错的。我已经看到了……终焉审判的破坏力，以及这个秘密所散发出的熵能……我无法保证终焉审判始终都会处在我们的掌控之中，也无法保证它的存在能取悦欧姆尼塞亚。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal pose les yeux sur le corps inerte de sa technoconsœur.{/n} « Nihel a violé la procédure, nous avons donc dû mettre un terme à ses fonctions, » {n}dit-il d'une voix austère, bien qu'affligée.{/n} « Mais cela ne signifie pas qu'elle avait tort. Ce que je vois... Le pouvoir destructeur d'Eschatos, l'énergie entropique qui émane de ce secret... Je ne peux pas garantir qu'Eschatos demeurera sous contrôle. Je ne peux pas garantir que son existence plaise à l'Omnimessie. »
languages.original_text: {n}As Pasqal gazes upon the body of his fallen tech-sister, his voice sounds stern and... mournful:{/n} "Nihel violated the procedure, and thus her functions had to be terminated. But that does not mean she was wrong. What I see... The destructive power of Eschatos, the entropic energy this secret emanates... I cannot guarantee that Eschatos remains controllable. I cannot guarantee that its existence pleases the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal pose les yeux sur le corps inerte de sa technoconsœur.{/n} « Nihel a violé la procédure, nous avons donc dû mettre un terme à ses fonctions, » {n}dit-il d'une voix austère, bien qu'affligée.{/n} « Mais cela ne signifie pas qu'elle avait tort. Ce que je vois... Le pouvoir destructeur d'Eschatos, l'énergie entropique qui émane de ce secret... Je ne peux pas garantir qu'Eschatos demeurera sous contrôle. Je ne peux pas garantir que son existence plaise à l'Omnimessie. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mientras Pasqal contempla el cuerpo de su tecnohermana, su voz se vuelve severa y... melancólica.{/n} «Nihel incumplió el procedimiento, por eso ha sido necesario poner fin a sus funciones, pero eso no quiere decir que estuviera equivocada. Lo que yo veo.... el poder destructivo de Eschatos, la energía entrópica que esconde este secreto... No puedo garantizar el control de Eschatos, ni tampoco que al Omnissiah le agrade su existencia».
languages.original_text: {n}As Pasqal gazes upon the body of his fallen tech-sister, his voice sounds stern and... mournful:{/n} "Nihel violated the procedure, and thus her functions had to be terminated. But that does not mean she was wrong. What I see... The destructive power of Eschatos, the entropic energy this secret emanates... I cannot guarantee that Eschatos remains controllable. I cannot guarantee that its existence pleases the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mientras Pasqal contempla el cuerpo de su tecnohermana, su voz se vuelve severa y... melancólica.{/n} «Nihel incumplió el procedimiento, por eso ha sido necesario poner fin a sus funciones, pero eso no quiere decir que estuviera equivocada. Lo que yo veo.... el poder destructivo de Eschatos, la energía entrópica que esconde este secreto... No puedo garantizar el control de Eschatos, ni tampoco que al Omnissiah le agrade su existencia».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Als Pasqal auf die Leiche seiner gefallenen Tech-Schwester blickt, klingt seine Stimme streng ... und traurig.{/n} "Nihel hat gegen die Prozedur verstoßen, daher mussten ihre Funktionen terminiert werden. Das heißt aber nicht, dass sie falsch lag. Was ich sehe ... Die zerstörerische Kraft von Eschatos, die entropische Energie, die dieses Geheimnis ausstrahlt ... Ich kann nicht garantieren, dass Eschatos kontrollierbar bleibt. Ich kann nicht garantieren, dass seine Existenz dem Omnissiah gefällt."
languages.original_text: {n}As Pasqal gazes upon the body of his fallen tech-sister, his voice sounds stern and... mournful:{/n} "Nihel violated the procedure, and thus her functions had to be terminated. But that does not mean she was wrong. What I see... The destructive power of Eschatos, the entropic energy this secret emanates... I cannot guarantee that Eschatos remains controllable. I cannot guarantee that its existence pleases the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Pasqal auf die Leiche seiner gefallenen Tech-Schwester blickt, klingt seine Stimme streng ... und traurig.{/n} "Nihel hat gegen die Prozedur verstoßen, daher mussten ihre Funktionen terminiert werden. Das heißt aber nicht, dass sie falsch lag. Was ich sehe ... Die zerstörerische Kraft von Eschatos, die entropische Energie, die dieses Geheimnis ausstrahlt ... Ich kann nicht garantieren, dass Eschatos kontrollierbar bleibt. Ich kann nicht garantieren, dass seine Existenz dem Omnissiah gefällt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, ölmüş tekno kardeşinin cesedine bakıyor. Sesi katı ve matemli çıkıyor.{/n} "Nihel, prosedürü ihlal etti. Dolayısıyla fonksiyonlarının devre dışı bırakılması gerekiyordu. Ancak bu, hatalı olduğu anlamına gelmez. Öyle ki... Eskatos'un yok edici gücü, bu oluşumun entropik enerjisi... Eskatos'un kontrol edilebilir kalacağını garanti edemem. Varlığının Hermesih'i hoşnut edeceğini garanti edemem."
languages.original_text: {n}As Pasqal gazes upon the body of his fallen tech-sister, his voice sounds stern and... mournful:{/n} "Nihel violated the procedure, and thus her functions had to be terminated. But that does not mean she was wrong. What I see... The destructive power of Eschatos, the entropic energy this secret emanates... I cannot guarantee that Eschatos remains controllable. I cannot guarantee that its existence pleases the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, ölmüş tekno kardeşinin cesedine bakıyor. Sesi katı ve... Matemli:{/n} "Nihel prosedürü ihlal etti, dolayısıyla fonksiyonlarının devre dışı bırakılması gerekiyordu. Bu, hatalı olduğu anlamına gelmiyor ama. Gördüğüm şey... Eschatos'un yok edici gücü, bu kutsal oluşumun entropik enerjisi... Eschatos'un kontrol edilebilir kalacağını garanti edemem. Varlığının Hermesih'i hoşnut edeceğini garanti edemem."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
